name: Shark Robot Transform war Hero
description:
It seems as if an enemy invasion is about to take place a futuristic robot battle is on the rise!!!in this situation the city really needs a hero simulator who can protect their beloved city!! The enemy robot have finally landed in your futuristic country to claim it their own but you can’t let that happen!!! Unleash your inner monster and prepare to save your city from invasion!!!
In this time of an uprising war simulator the city needs a loyal hero simulator who can faithfully rescue their country and that hero simulator is you and your futuristic shark robot simulator hero with converting abilities to fight both over and underwater!!! Your unlimited and most famous attacking strategy of the shark is an essential way to rescue the city from evil enemy robots!!! So, be prepared diligently!!
Once the game begins you will be going up against the enemy robot who have landed to conquer your land and claim it their own!! It will become a war simulator situation where there is a constant fear of destruction!! It is your duty to risk everything and protect your people!!
The special and new thing about this robot game is that it is set both in the city and underwater because enemy robots will be attacking from under the sea as well!! Good thing your hero simulator robot can turn in to shark robot and save havoc from under the sea!! Which opts for an epic sea adventure!!
So, when the enemy robots attack you can lead them underwater and begin the sea adventure by converting a shark robot and begin the futuristic robot battle and win for your people underwater and also on land!!
There are multiple fighting levels with futuristic robot battle attacking and war simulator situation and all levels come with a fair number of enemy robots so you have to defeat them all and claim your world as your own!!
Download this game to rightly claim the title of being the hero simulator shark who protected their entire country and people from evil destruction spreading enemies!! Defeat the enemy as simple robot and also as the shark in futuristic robot battle robot game!!! Unleash your hidden attacks and surprise everyone with your underwater fighting skills!!
*** HOW TO PLAY THE GAME ***
• Press the play button and start
• Choose the level you want to play
• Select the shark robot you want to take along against enemy
• Start the mission and begin to play
• Use onscreen joystick to move around
• More onscreen controls provided include special attacks on land and underwater
• Attack the enemy
• After defeating each enemy move to the next level!!
*** FEATURES OF THE GAME ***      
• 3D simulation
• Multiple hero simulator robots
• Onscreen controllers and joystick
• Target battle game
• City and underwater display setting simulation
• Health bars and information
